00019 /** \file
00020   \brief Tools to open the sim port
00021 */
00022 
00023 #include <windows.h>
00024 #include <string.h>
00025 #include <stdlib.h>
00026 #include <stdio.h>
00027 #include <time.h>
00028 
00029 #include "windowssimport.h"
00030 #include "simport.h"
00031 
00032 WindowsSimPort::WindowsSimPort(const char *port) {
00033     portname = NULL;
00034 
00035     if(NULL == port || 0 == strlen(port)) {
00036         return;
00037     }
00038 
00039     portname = strdup(port);
00040 
00041     char fullportname[512];
00042     snprintf(fullportname, sizeof(fullportname), "\\\\.\\%s", portname);
00043     portHandle=CreateFileA(fullportname, GENERIC_READ|GENERIC_WRITE,0, NULL, OPEN_EXISTING, 0, NULL);
00044     if (portHandle == INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE) {
00045         fprintf(stderr, "Invalid handle returned by CreateFileA [port \"%s\"]\n", fullportname);
00046         return;
00047     }
00048     COMMCONFIG Win_CommConfig;
00049     COMMTIMEOUTS Win_CommTimeouts;
00050     unsigned long confSize = sizeof(COMMCONFIG);
00051     Win_CommConfig.dwSize = confSize;
00052     GetCommConfig(portHandle, &Win_CommConfig, &confSize);
00053     Win_CommConfig.dcb.Parity = 0;
00054     Win_CommConfig.dcb.fRtsControl = RTS_CONTROL_DISABLE;
00055     Win_CommConfig.dcb.fOutxCtsFlow = FALSE;
00056     Win_CommConfig.dcb.fOutxDsrFlow = FALSE;
00057     Win_CommConfig.dcb.fDtrControl = DTR_CONTROL_DISABLE;
00058     Win_CommConfig.dcb.fDsrSensitivity = FALSE;
00059     Win_CommConfig.dcb.fNull=FALSE;
00060     Win_CommConfig.dcb.fTXContinueOnXoff = FALSE;
00061     Win_CommConfig.dcb.fInX=FALSE;
00062     Win_CommConfig.dcb.fOutX=FALSE;
00063     Win_CommConfig.dcb.fBinary=TRUE;
00064     Win_CommConfig.dcb.DCBlength = sizeof(DCB);
00065     Win_CommConfig.dcb.BaudRate = 9600;
00066     Win_CommConfig.dcb.ByteSize = 8;
00067     Win_CommTimeouts.ReadIntervalTimeout = 50;
00068     Win_CommTimeouts.ReadTotalTimeoutMultiplier = 0;
00069     Win_CommTimeouts.ReadTotalTimeoutConstant = 110;
00070     Win_CommTimeouts.WriteTotalTimeoutMultiplier = 0;
00071     Win_CommTimeouts.WriteTotalTimeoutConstant = 110;
00072     SetCommConfig(portHandle, &Win_CommConfig, sizeof(COMMCONFIG));
00073     SetCommTimeouts(portHandle,&Win_CommTimeouts);
00074 
00075 
00076     setUsable(1);
00077 }
00078 
00079 WindowsSimPort::~WindowsSimPort() {
00080     delete portname;
00081     if(isUsable()) {
00082         CloseHandle(portHandle);
00083     }
00084 }
00085 
00086 char *WindowsSimPort::getPort() {
00087     return portname;
00088 }
00089 
00090 char *WindowsSimPort::readLine() {
00091     int nbytes; // Number of bytes read
00092     char *currpos = readbuf + readbuf_pos;
00093 
00094     ReadFile(portHandle, (void*)currpos, sizeof(readbuf) - readbuf_pos, (LPDWORD)&nbytes, NULL);
00095 
00096     if(0 < nbytes) {
00097         writeLog(currpos, SERIAL_IN);
00098 
00099         if(getEcho()) {
00100             writeData(currpos,0);
00101         }
00102 
00103         // printf("Read %i bytes. strn is now '%s'\n", nbytes, readbuf);
00104         readbuf_pos += nbytes;
00105         char *lineend = strstr(readbuf, "\r");
00106         if(NULL == lineend) { // Just in case
00107             char *lineend = strstr(readbuf, "\n");
00108         }
00109 
00110         if(NULL != lineend) {
00111             int length = lineend - readbuf;
00112             strncpy(lastread, readbuf, length);
00113             lastread[length]='\0';
00114 
00115             while(*lineend == '\r' || *lineend == '\n') {
00116                 lineend++;
00117             }
00118             memmove(readbuf, lineend, sizeof(readbuf) - (lineend - readbuf));
00119             readbuf_pos -= (lineend - readbuf);
00120 
00121             return lastread;
00122         }
00123     }
00124     return NULL;
00125 }
00126 
00127 void WindowsSimPort::writeData(const char *line, int log) {
00128     int len;
00129     if(log) writeLog(line, SERIAL_OUT);
00130     WriteFile(portHandle,line,(DWORD)strlen(line),(LPDWORD)&len,NULL);
00131 }
00132 
00133 #ifndef HAVE_GETTIMEOFDAY
00134 int gettimeofday(struct timeval *tv, struct timezone *tz) {
00135     FILETIME ft;
00136     unsigned __int64 tmpres = 0;
00137     static int tzflag = 0;
00138 
00139     if (NULL != tv) {
00140         GetSystemTimeAsFileTime(&ft);
00141 
00142         tmpres |= ft.dwHighDateTime;
00143         tmpres <<= 32;
00144         tmpres |= ft.dwLowDateTime;
00145 
00146         tmpres /= 10;  /*convert into microseconds*/
00147         /*converting file time to unix epoch*/
00148         tmpres -= DELTA_EPOCH_IN_MICROSECS; 
00149         tv->tv_sec = (long)(tmpres / 1000000UL);
00150         tv->tv_usec = (long)(tmpres % 1000000UL);
00151     }
00152 
00153     if (NULL != tz) {
00154         if (!tzflag) {
00155             _tzset();
00156             tzflag++;
00157         }
00158         tz->tz_minuteswest = _timezone / 60;
00159         tz->tz_dsttime = _daylight;
00160     }
00161 
00162     return 0;
00163 }
00164 #endif //HAVE_GETTIMEOFDAY
